name: Gems and Jewels
description:
Collect the colored Gems & Jewels, each one has his own score & experience value.

Experience is created randomly every new game.

The black Gems & Jewels are friend and foe, use them wisely.

They increase your score but decrease your experience.

The Black Gems and Jewels have a nice twist if you touch them.

This game is for all ages.
